name: Pasta with Shrimp, Asparagus, and Bell Peppers
author: TerryMac
summary: Colorful shrimp with asparagus over pasta. Add a salad and garlic bread.
ingredients: ½ cup sliced green onions, mostly white and lighter green parts
6 cloves garlic, crushed, or to taste
1 cup diagonally cut asparagus spears (1-inch pieces)
1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
3 tablespoons diced tomatoes and green chiles (such as RO*TEL®)
2 tablespoons shredded Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil
Cook fettuccine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
At the same time, heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium heat
Add bell peppers, green onions, and garlic; cook until almost tender, 5 to 6 minutes
Quickly stir in asparagus and Italian seasoning
Add shrimp and diced tomatoes and chiles; toss until shrimp just start to turn pink, 2 to 3 minutes
Add   and stir to avoid sticking
Cook and stir until sauce is hot and bubbling, and shrimp are bright pink on the outside and the meat is opaque, 3 to 5 minutes
Serve sauce over fettuccine and garnish with Parmesan cheese
